actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to Subcommittee on Health and the Environment.

official_title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that certain regulations regarding tall stacks shall not apply to stationary sources which have received EPA approval for the stack height.

summary.text: Amends the Clean Air Act to exempt from tall stack requirements certain stationary sources which have received prior approval from the Administrator of the Environmental Protection Agency for their particular stack height.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to provide that certain regulations regarding tall stacks shall not apply to stationary sources which have received EPA approval for the stack height.
